mapper.select: select id, student_id, teacher_id, course_id, attendance_record, assignment_record, exam_recond, total_points, year, phases, save_date, updata_date from ScoreManagement.score where id = #{id}

select id, student_id, teacher_id, course_id, attendance_record, assignment_record, exam_recond, total_points, year, phases, save_date, updata_date from ScoreManagement.score limit #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT distinct score.student_id,score.attendance_record,score.assignment_record,score.exam_recond,score.total_points,score.`year`,score.phases FROM course INNER JOIN course_arrangement on course.id=course_arrangement.course_id INNER JOIN score ON score.course_id=course.id WHERE course_arrangement.class_id=3174 and score.phases=1 and course.`name`='JAVAWEB'

SELECT distinct score.student_id,score.attendance_record,score.assignment_record,score.exam_recond,score.total_points,score.`year`,score.phases FROM course INNER JOIN course_arrangement on course.id=course_arrangement.course_id INNER JOIN score ON score.course_id=course.id WHERE course_arrangement.class_id=#{id} and score.phases=#{phases} and course.`name`=#{name}

SELECT distinct score.student_id,score.attendance_record,score.assignment_record,score.exam_recond,score.total_points,score.`year`,score.phases FROM course INNER JOIN course_arrangement on course.id=course_arrangement.course_id INNER JOIN score ON score.course_id=course.id INNER JOIN class on class.id=course_arrangement.class_id WHERE class.id=#{classId}
mapper.insert: insert into ScoreManagement.score(student_id, teacher_id, course_id, attendance_record, assignment_record, exam_recond, total_points, year, phases, save_date, updata_date) values (#{student.id}, #{teacher.id}, #{course.id}, #{attendanceRecord}, #{assignmentRecord}, #{examRecond}, #{totalPoints}, #{year}, #{phases}, #{saveDate}, #{updataDate})
mapper.update:
